response.overview: With Tal Anderson, Anthony Purnell. In this charming romantic comedy, Emily Martin, a twenty-something aspiring songwriter is perfectly content without a boyfriend. She loves her time by herself: watching movies and spending time with her cat. Suddenly, everything changes when she finds herself in a duet with a stranger. Polyphony stars neurodivergent actors Anderson (Atypical, As We See It) and Purnell (Wild, Wild, West Hollywood) as neighbors who form an unexpected connection through song.
response.title: Polyphony
